com.ooyala.android.configuration

Class Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ooyala.android.configuration.Options
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadonlyOptionsInterface

    public class Options
extends java.lang.Object
implements ReadonlyOptionsInterface
    A read-only class of configurations for OoyalaPlayer. Use the Builder class to generate a valid Options for the OoyalaPlayer
    See Also:
    Options.Builder

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Options.Builder
      Supports a fluid syntax for configuration.
